alert.note: Alert for Beartooth Foothills; Livingston Area (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 17 at 3:04PM MST until December 19 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 5 PM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Blowing snow and strong winds expected. Winds gusting as high as 65 mph. * WHERE...Livingston Area and Beartooth Foothills. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 5 PM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Blowing snow will reduce visibility to as low as one- half mile at times and could cause roads to become slippery. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strong crosswinds will make travel difficult along Interstate 90 from Livingston to Big Timber and roads along the Beartooth Foothills.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution and consider postponing travel until winds subside, or take an alternate route. For the latest road conditions, call 5 1 1. Additional graphics for this hazard can be found at http://www.weather.gov/billings
